text: Hagi pristi vahe'mo'za otigahazema hu'nea kankamunte otizageno, Livae naga'mo'zanena ana zanke hu'za kanti kaziga otine'za, Deviti'ma Ra Anumzamofo vagaore avesi zanku'ma agima ahentesga nehu'za, ahesnaze hu'noma tro'ma hunte'nea zavenaramina eri'neza oti'naze. Hagi kanti kaziga pristi naga'mo'za ufenerage'za mika Israeli vahe'mo'za oti'naze.
